SPK_GEN_LANG_001.title: The student will be able to construct grammatically correct simple and compound sentences, understanding the role of conjunctions in connecting independent clauses.

GRM_SS_CORE_001.title: The student will be able to identify and correctly use subjects, verbs, and objects to construct simple, grammatically correct sentences.

GRM_VT_TENSE_001.title: The student will be able to identify and correctly use the simple, progressive, and perfect tenses (present, past, future) in basic sentences to clearly express when an action happens.

Ensuring subject-verb agreement.: Introd.title: Ensuring subject-verb agreement.: Introduction - Thesis Statement
